But I saw in our conference meeting some laid out the work that God was to give exercises, and rebels were to be purged out in the meeting. Then 


                                  -301- 

the honest, conscientious ones began to tremble, "I am afraid [that] I shall be purged out," and they take their minds from Jesus, and fix them upon themselves and others, and the meeting leaves them lower than it found them. I saw that we must try to lift our minds above self and have them dwell upon God, the high and lofty One.
